name: A Lost Night
description:
Story:

You were going to your cottage for a relaxing weekend away from the city.

Recently there have been rumors around the town of a terrifying monster that eats people during the night.

So far, 10 people have gone missing.

This doesn't bother you though because you don't believe in that kind of stuff.

All you have on you are your car keys and flashlight.

The darkness is so thick you can't see an inch ahead of your car.

You are almost at your destination.
